constituent: pop song, mouth, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: There is a lot of money to be made of one's songs are "popular." This is depicted here as a stream of clams spewing out of the mouth of someone performing a pop song.
koohiiStory1: The new generation of pop songs have no depth. They just mouth empty lyrics to get money. Not like the pop songs of my day.
koohiiStory2: A new way for sluts to use their mouths to make alot of money.
